ygData.subject: Fetching compressed web sites
ygData.msgSnippet: I am trying to fetch pages from a server, which seems to provide just gz-compressed pages. Heritrix added to the seed list redirects of the following form:

I am trying to fetch pages from a server, which seems to provide just gz-co=
mpressed pages. Heritrix added to the seed list redirects of the following =
form: 

http://www.xxxxxxx.com/xxxxx/
# Heritrix added seed redirect from h=
ttp://www.xxxxxxx.com/xxxxx/.
http://www.xxxxxxx.com/xxxxx/index.html.gz

B=
y fectching sites from the server with wget I get also only compressed vers=
ions (gzip) of the sites.  
It seems that the HTMLExtractor don't work for =
pages that are gzip (see earlier post here). Therefore heritrix is not able=
 to follow the links and I can not crawl the server.

Even if I try to fetc=
h the site with wget an http-header information, like  
wget --header=3D"Ac=
cept: text/html, text/plain" http://www.xxxxxxx.com/xxxxx/

I just get the =
compressed version of a site. Is there a fix available that heritrix can ha=
ndle compressed sites and extract html-links? It seems not so difficult to =
integrate a gunzip (via java.util.zip). It seems like a common problem to m=
e.

Thanks for answers,
 Christian
